sentences.english: Its always warm in spring, hot in summer and cold in winter.
sentences.chinese: 它總是溫暖的春天，夏熱冬冷。

sentences.english: A:Arlene,what is the most besutiful place around the coutry in spring?
sentences.chinese: 艾蓮，春天這個國家最漂亮的地方是哪裏？

sentences.english: Do not think spring does not need compensatory moisture damply .
sentences.chinese: 別以爲春天潮溼就不需要補充水分。

sentences.english: Myriads of twigs are to plant spring throughout the desert.
sentences.chinese: 千枝萬枝要把春天插遍沙漠。

sentences.english: Your lips are of be vividly portrayed spring.
sentences.chinese: 你的脣邊是呼之欲出的春天。

sentences.english: Warm breezes index the approach of spring.
sentences.chinese: 溫暖的和風表明春天的到來。

sentences.english: The two promoted the film at the Cannes Film Festival that spring.
sentences.chinese: 那個春天，兩人將這部電影帶到了戛納電影節上。

sentences.english: One afternoon someone noticed a slight yellowish-brown tint in the spring .
sentences.chinese: 一個下午某人在春天注意了輕微的淡黃棕色的色彩。

sentences.english: A flower withered, not the whole barren spring.
sentences.chinese: 一花凋零，荒蕪不了整個春天。

sentences.english: I love to watch everything come to life in spring.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看到春天萬象更新。

sentences.english: Can you feel the spring in the air?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有感受到春天的氣息？

sentences.english: It is those lines of foot-prints that are weaved into fairy tales of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 那一行行的腳印編織了我兒時春天的童話。
那將是春天中僅剩的熊嗎？

sentences.english: The full cast will be announced next year and filming will begin in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 全體演職員表將於明年公佈，並在春天開拍。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
